testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.content: Kirankumar's BESS optimization engine transformed our trading operations. His MILP-based approach delivered a consistent 12% improvement in profitability while reducing battery degradation by 15%. The production-ready system he built handles our entire 4GW portfolio seamlessly.

testimonials.name: Dr. James Morrison
testimonials.content: Outstanding work on multi-agent reinforcement learning systems. Kirankumar's innovative approach to airspace management achieved a 40% throughput increase while maintaining safety protocols. His technical depth in MARL is exceptional.

testimonials.name: Maria Rodriguez
testimonials.content: Kirankumar brings rare expertise in energy storage optimization. His real-time scheduling algorithms for our 100+ MW marine charging infrastructure exceeded expectations. Professional, detail-oriented, and delivers results.

testimonials.name: Alex Thompson
testimonials.content: Collaborated with Kirankumar on computer vision projects using Vision Transformers. His implementation achieved 18% accuracy improvement over existing benchmarks in GPS-denied navigation. Impressive problem-solving skills and clean code.

testimonials.name: Dr. Emily Watson
testimonials.content: Kirankumar's research contributions in autonomous navigation are significant. His ViT-SLAM integration work represents a major advancement in the field. Excellent technical writing and presentation skills.

testimonials.name: David Park
testimonials.content: Working with Kirankumar on energy market forecasting was excellent. His probabilistic models and MILP optimization expertise helped us achieve sub-second decision making in volatile markets. Highly recommend his services.

testimonials.name: Lisa Kumar
testimonials.content: Kirankumar delivered exceptional results on our ML infrastructure project. His experience with PyTorch, production-grade Python, and scalable systems made him invaluable to our team. Strong technical leadership.

testimonials.name: Robert Singh
testimonials.content: Brought Kirankumar in as a consultant for our BESS deployment strategy. His end-to-end system design and market expertise were crucial to our success. Professional delivery and excellent communication throughout.
